channel.title: Comments on: The Natural History “Watch This House” video

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: cool. the singer did PR for big hassle back then, so i had dealt with him from that capacity. it was cool to discover his band. i bought that second record yesterday. it's a little different but still pretty damn good.
item.content:encoded: cool. the singer did PR for big hassle back then, so i had dealt with him from that capacity. it was cool to discover his band. i bought that second record yesterday. it’s a little different but still pretty damn good.

item.title: By: Trey
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description: Natural History were one of the first touring bands to play at the Village Tavern. They were really great guys and I know played at least one other time supporting someone else (may have been Oranges Band). I have had a soft spot for them ever since and love the EP. Thanks for prompting me to give it another listen. It is a shame they gave it up.
item.content:encoded: Natural History were one of the first touring bands to play at the Village Tavern. They were really great guys and I know played at least one other time supporting someone else (may have been Oranges Band). I have had a soft spot for them ever since and love the EP. Thanks for prompting me to give it another listen. It is a shame they gave it up.
